updates.name: Compatibility issues with Intel Smart Sound Technology drivers
updates.description: Devices with the affected Intel SST driver might receive an error with a blue screen.

updates.name: The February 2024 security update might fail to install
updates.description: Some users reported the update’s download stops at 96% and fails to install

updates.name: Some apps might fail to playback, record, or capture video
updates.description: Apps and cameras using WVC1 codec might fail to function as expected.

updates.name: Desktop icons might move unexpectedly between monitors
updates.description: This issue is only observed if you are using more than one monitor when attempting to use Copilot.

updates.name: Printer names and icons might be changed and HP Smart app automatically installs
updates.description: In most cases, it is possible to use the printer for printing jobs and other features such as copy, scan, or fax.

updates.name: Received reports about issues connecting to Wi-Fi networks
updates.description: We have confirmed this issue was caused by KB5032288 and KB5033375, released in December 2023

updates.name: 'Local Security Authority protection is off' with persistent restart
updates.description: Devices with the affected Intel SST driver might receive an error with a blue screen.

updates.name: Saving or copying files might intermittently fail
updates.description: You might receive an error or files might intermittently fail to save or copy, especially to network shares.

updates.name: Intermittent issues with speech recognition when using Chinese or Japanese
updates.description: This issue might also affect expressive input, and handwriting recognition.

updates.name: Third-party UI customization apps
updates.description: Updates released February 28, 2023 or later.

updates.name: Some apps might fail to playback, record, or capture video
updates.description: Apps and cameras using WVC1 codec might fail to function as expected.

updates.name: Some apps might fail to playback, record, or capture video
updates.description: Apps and cameras using WVC1 codec might fail to function as expected.

updates.name: Desktop icons might move unexpectedly between monitors
updates.description: This issue is only observed if you are using more than one monitor when attempting to use Copilot.

updates.name: Printer names and icons might be changed and HP Smart app automatically installs
updates.description: In most cases, it is possible to use the printer for printing jobs and other features such as copy, scan, or fax.

updates.name: Microsoft received reports about an “UNSUPPORTED_PROCESSOR” error
updates.description: Investigation concluded that the error reported by users was not caused by the August 2023 preview updates.

updates.name: WSUS might not offer updates to Windows 11, version 22H2
updates.description: Updates released February 14, 2023 might not be offered via WSUS to some client devices.

updates.name: When using Outlook, opening links in emails might display an error
updates.description: Office updates released July 11, 2023 introduce this behavior by design due to the new security protections
